OOC: Okay, how the hell did Koj know what Deemos said? No way he could have
unless he was mere feet away, which he wasn't, I suggest you rewrite that
post, before the mods attack you, Ryo D...

Sent: Saturday, November 11, 2000 7:51 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars now its personal


> ::Koj::
> After the comment deemos just made the armor on Koj neck grows tighter as
he
> gets a funny filling."Tell KitKat that she can contact me when she is
ready
> to talk."Leaves a signal becon."Don't rush it Alliance we will meet again
> and then we shall see who is the stronger and who is dead!"
>
> ::Inu::
> Inu stands "You got the feeling too?"
>
> ::Koj::
> "Yeahs its time to get stronger!" As Koj climbs on Inu and they exit the
> pred base.  Heading towards his pratice area.
>
> ::Inu::
> Lands at the area sets down and enters Neo Bahamut mode."Ready?"
>
> ::Koj::
> "Koj Yeah!" As he grabs the fang and rush Neo fighting 100 times harder
then
> he did the first the sparred. Now has the desire to get stronger and
master
> the School of Legend.
>
> ::Neo::
> Neo races to meet Koj thinking it is true the Tekno crystals in armor do

Alliance
> even if Koj never attacked exposing the crystals in his body to all the

win
